chainsawsuit regulars club – chainsawsuit – three panels daily

comics and goofs by kris straub

chainsawsuit regulars club

Apr06
on April 6, 2010
Chapter: thecomic

where is the man in the chainsawsuit, you ask

well, he has no time for such frivolities. he is fighting zombies twenty-four-sev

except for when he’s asleep, or at work, or relaxing. otherwise, fightin zombies
